components.name: MySQL Server
components.description: This component contains the process to install MySQL Server

properties.scriptBody:
OS=$(lsb_release -si)
if [ -z "$USER" ]; then
    USER=`whoami`
fi

CMD=
if [ "$USER" != "root" ]; then
    CMD="sudo"
fi
echo "Installing MySQL for ${OS}"
chmod u+x "$PWD"/${OS}_percona.sh
if [ "${OS}" == "Ubuntu" ] ; then
    $CMD "$PWD"/${OS}_percona.sh
else
    $CMD "$PWD"/${OS}_percona.sh
fi

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

properties.scriptBody:
OS=$(lsb_release -si)
if [ -z "$USER" ]; then
    USER=`whoami`
fi

CMD=
if [ "$USER" != "root" ]; then
    CMD="sudo"
fi
echo "Found Operating System: $OS"
case "$OS" in
	RedHatEnterpriseServer)
		$CMD yum clean all
		;;
	CentOS)
		$CMD yum clean all
		;;
	Ubuntu)
		$CMD apt-get update -y;
		;;
	*)
		echo "Could not determine Operating System."
        exit 1;
		;;
esac

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

properties.scriptBody:
if [ -z "$USER" ]; then
    USER=`whoami`
fi

CMD=
if [ "$USER" != "root" ]; then
    CMD="sudo"
fi
if [ -f /etc/my.cnf ] ; then
    sed -i "s/127.0.0.1/0.0.0.0/g" /etc/my.cnf
fi
$CMD service mysql restart

properties.scriptBody:
if [ -z "$USER" ]; then
    USER=`whoami`
fi

CMD=
if [ "$USER" != "root" ]; then
    CMD="sudo"
fi
if command -v dpkg; then
    $CMD apt-get -y update
    $CMD apt-get -y install lsb-core
else
    $CMD yum -y update
    $CMD yum -y install redhat-lsb-core
fi

processes.name: deploy mysql 5.7
processes.description: Install mysql using the package manager

properties.scriptBody:
if command -v lsb_release; then 
  OS=$(lsb_release -si)
else 
  OS="CentOS"
fi


case "$OS" in
	RedHatEnterpriseServer)
		echo "Installing MySQL for RHEL"
		yum -y install mysql-server
                service mysqld start
		;;
	CentOS)
                echo "Installing MySQL for CentOS"
		yum -y install mysql-server
                service mysqld start
		;;
	Ubuntu)
                echo "Installing MySQL for Ubuntu"
		export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
		sudo -E apt-get -q -y install mysql-server-5.7;
		;;
	*)
		echo "Could not determine Operating System."
                exit 1;
		;;
esac

mysqladmin -u root password passw0rd;

properties.scriptBody:
if command -v lsb_release; then 
  OS=$(lsb_release -si)
else 
  OS="CentOS"
fi
echo "Found Operating System: $OS"
case "$OS" in
	RedHatEnterpriseServer)
		yum clean all
		;;
	CentOS)
		yum clean all
		;;
	Ubuntu)
		apt-get update -y;
		;;
	*)
		echo "Could not determine Operating System."
                exit 1;
		;;
esac

properties.contents:
<server description="new server">

    <!-- Enable features -->
    <featureManager>
        <feature>jsp-2.2</feature>
    </featureManager>

    <!-- To access this server from a remote client add a host attribute to the following element, e.g. host="*" -->
    <httpEndpoint id="defaultHttpEndpoint"
                  host="*"
                  httpPort="9080"
                  httpsPort="9443" />

</server>
